overview: Tarzan tries to stop a bloodthirsty Colonel from taking over an African village with his soldiers of fortune. The ape-man has been rendered deaf by an exploding hand grenade, effectively limiting one of his keen senses. Tarzan relies on his telepathic powers to stop a lion. Woody Strode also appears in this film that combines two made for television episodes.
tagline: Guns, grenades and an army of men roar through the jungle to destroy the most dangerous animal alive...TARZAN!
title: Tarzan's Deadly Silence
